name: Wendell And Kendall
description:
This game is about Wendell and Kendall who are some of the last humans left on the planet, you will be tested on skills of dodging lasers and whoever lasts longest or if you both get through all rounds wins and gets a spaceship to leave the planet. PLAY IN FULL SCREEN Objective -
  • Both Characters Avoid Red Lasers
  • Kendall Avoid Purple Lasers
  • Wendell Avoid Purple Lasers

If you last all of the time you win the round, to leave the planet complete all rounds

Player 1 Controls (Wendell) -

Up = W 

Left = A

Right = D

Player 2 Controls (Kendall) -

Up = Up Arrow Key

Left = Left Arrow Key

Right = Right Arrow Key
